remarks: A lexicographical ordering of two posets.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Mar-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)
statement:
poxp.1 $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. ( A X. B ) /\ y e. ( A X. B ) ) /\ ( ( 1st ` x ) R ( 1st ` y ) \/ ( ( 1st ` x ) = ( 1st ` y ) /\ ( 2nd ` x ) S ( 2nd ` y ) ) ) ) } $.
poxp $p |- ( ( R Po A /\ S Po B ) -> T Po ( A X. B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
